data.name: XMarkableStream
desc: makes it possible to set and remove seekable marks to a stream.

methods.name: createMark
desc: creates a mark of the current position and returns an identifier to it.

methods.name: deleteMark
desc: deletes the mark that you previously created with XMarkableStream.createMark().
It is an error to delete a mark if other marks after this exist. In this case, for reasons of robustness, the implementation must delete this mark and all others after this mark.

methods.name: jumpToFurthest
desc: jumps to the furthest position of the stream.

In the inputstream case, a subsequent read call returns data, that was never read or skipped over before. In the outputstream case, a subsequent write call will add new data at the end of the stream without overwriting existing data.

methods.name: jumpToMark
desc: jumps to a previously created mark.
